original_title: Wild El Salvador: In the Shadow of the Volcanoes
overview: Join affable presenter Nigel Marven as he explores El Salvador, the volatile land of volcanoes with a colorful culture and natural history. Follow along as he climbs an active volcano near the capital San Salvador, comes face-to-face with a crocodile, cuddles a caecilian, fights fire with fire, dives deep into a volcanic lake, and discovers the Pompeii of Central America.
title: Wild El Salvador: In the Shadow of the Volcanoes
